newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Heineken shares drop below 300 guilders.
newsitem.headline: Heineken shares drop below 300 guilders.

text.p: Shares in Dutch brewer Heineken NV dropped a further 26.50 guilders ($15.68) or around 8.00 percent to 296.00 on Monday, sliding through the 300 guilders a share level for the first time since February.

The shares, trading on Monday ex last week's 1.50 guilder interim dividend, have plunged 18.4 percent since the company last Friday announced lower than expected first half profit and warned full year net would be lower than in 1995.
The news sparked waves of heavy selling on Friday which continued on Monday with 679,000 shares changing hands by 0952 GMT, compared to an average daily turnover of 200,000-400,000.
